blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: hi there. i just want to say that i appreciate you and a lot of what you have to say. you’re always very polite and articulate...
question: hi there. i just want to say that i appreciate you and a lot of what you have to say. you’re always very polite and articulate and raise interesting points worth considering. i’m sorry people are so quick to shut you down and be rude simply for having a different view. no one has to agree on anything but the very least we can do is be kind and polite to each other.
answer: Thank you so much for taking the time to write this. It does mean a lot to hear nice things like this from time to time and it makes me really happy to hear you say you have found some of the things I have had to say interesting and worth considering. I hope you are having a lovely day, evening, or night wherever you are in the world, anon.

reblog.comment: Thank you so much for taking the time to write this. It does mean a lot to hear nice things like this from time to time and it makes me really happy to hear you say you have found some of the things I have had to say interesting and worth considering. I hope you are having a lovely day, evening, or night wherever you are in the world, anon.

trail.content_raw: Thank you so much for taking the time to write this. It does mean a lot to hear nice things like this from time to time and it makes me really happy to hear you say you have found some of the things I have had to say interesting and worth considering. I hope you are having a lovely day, evening, or night wherever you are in the world, anon.
trail.content: Thank you so much for taking the time to write this. It does mean a lot to hear nice things like this from time to time and it makes me really happy to hear you say you have found some of the things I have had to say interesting and worth considering. I hope you are having a lovely day, evening, or night wherever you are in the world, anon.
